DataElement.preferredName: Cancer Patient Tobacco Use Questionnaire 7f Smoked Cigarettes Since Last Visit to this Clinic Category
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of their smoking behavior since their last visit to this clinic.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Cancer Patient Tobacco Use Questionnaire Smoked Cigarettes Since Last Visit to This Clinic
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire developed for the baseline and longitudinal assessment of tobacco use in the cancer setting. Domains include cigarette smoking history and current use, use relative to cancer diagnosis and treatment, other tobacco product use, cessation, and second-hand exposure._A question about whether an individual smoked cigarettes since their last visit to this clinic.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire developed for the baseline and longitudinal assessment of tobacco use in the cancer setting. Domains include cigarette smoking history and current use, use relative to cancer diagnosis and treatment, other tobacco product use, cessation, and second-hand exposure.

Concepts.definition: A questionnaire developed for the baseline and longitudinal assessment of tobacco use in the cancer setting. Domains include cigarette smoking history and current use, use relative to cancer diagnosis and treatment, other tobacco product use, cessation, and second-hand exposure.

Property.preferredName: Smoked Cigarettes Since Last Visit to This Clinic
Property.preferredDefinition: A question about whether an individual smoked cigarettes since their last visit to this clinic.

Concepts.longName: Smoked Cigarettes Since Last Visit to This Clinic
Concepts.definition: A question about whether an individual smoked cigarettes since their last visit to this clinic.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A grouping of items based on some commonality or by user defined characteristics.

PermissibleValues.value: This is my first visit to this clinic.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that this is an individual's first visit to the clinic.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that this is an individual's first visit to the clinic.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has not completed treatment for cancer.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has not completed treatment for cancer.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has not been treated for cancer.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has not been treated for cancer.

PermissibleValues.value: I have not had cancer surgery.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has not had surgery for cancer.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has not had surgery for cancer.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has not been diagnosed with cancer.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has not been diagnosed with cancer.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual smoked a cigarette some days.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual smoked a cigarette some days.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual smoked a cigarette every day.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual smoked a cigarette every day.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual didn't smoke a cigarette at all.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual didn't smoke a cigarette at all.

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Don't Know or Not Sure When Smoked a Cigarette
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual doesn't know or is not sure whether they smoked a cigarette.

Concepts.longName: Don't Know or Not Sure When Smoked a Cigarette
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual doesn't know or is not sure whether they smoked a cigarette.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Since your last visit to this
ReferenceDocuments.description: Since your last visit to this clinic

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value sets in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. Changes may not be made to these CDEs.
